entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • InputBase should clear validation message store on Dispose for dynamic forms #44531
  • ASP.NET HTTPS request "hangs" when reading request stream on certain requests #44525
  • [dotnet-sdk-7.0.100-rtm.22510.17] Microsoft.JSInterop.JSException: Converting circular structure to JSON when opening a new tab #44521
  • blazor server signalr JsonReaderException #44520
  • 'dotnet publish' does not publish wwwroot when Blazor project is a dependency #44519
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, json, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #44517

Closed

  • Add RenderFragment-like functionality to pure partials and view components in pure Razor SST #40299
    Backlog
  • Easily passing RenderFragment children to Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.TagHelpers.ComponentTagHelper #31772
    Backlog
  • The `IJSObjectReference.Invoke` implementation does not support Javascript properties (i.e. getters and setters) #25756
    Backlog
  • .NET5 RC1: WebAssemblyPrerendered with authentication enabled #26270
    Backlog
  • Blazor + TailwindCss template #37644
    Backlog
  • Support for extraQueryParameters in Blazor WASM / MSAL #25391
    Backlog
  • Components: Add Compiler generated strongly-typed methods for URL generation #6352
    Backlog
  • Please release new version of Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Abstraction #44457
  • Razor Class Library Different Output when using GeneratePackageOnBuild vs dotnet pack #44382
  • PageModel IUrlHelper DI for integration tests? #44518
  • Perf improvement: json, mvc #44454
  • Perf regression: json_netty #44478
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #44482
  • Web API project with RateLimiting middleware - Unhandled exception. System.NotImplementedException: The method or operation is not implemented #44494
  • Performance issue with PersistentComponentState #44271

PullRequests

Created

  • Skip template update check in template tests #44532
    area-mvc
  • [release/6.0] Fix components-e2e pipeline #44530
    6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Fixing XML documentation #44523

Merged

  • Write manual Parallel.For to await test result #44528
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview1
  • [release/7.0] Stabilize versions #44485
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • [release/7.0] Add comment about mixing FallbackPolicy with AuthorizeFilter #44506
    Servicing-approved, area-web-frameworks, 7.0.0
  • Fixing XML documentation #44511
    8.0-preview1
  • Fix ProjectTemplate test failure logs on helix #43789
    area-mvc, 8.0-preview1
  • Add code cleanup rules (+perf) #44269
    8.0-preview1

Updated

  • Experiment with named pipes transport #44426
    area-runtime
  • Add analyzer and code fix to recommend against IHeaderDictionary.Add #44463
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Fix logging of certificate chain errors. #44503
    area-security, community-contribution
  • [AuthZ] Add IRequirementData #44342
    area-security
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2019976 #43956
    blocked, area-infrastructure
  • Update documentation for default CookieBuilder options #44290
    Docs, area-security
  • Add comment about mixing FallbackPolicy with AuthorizeFilter #44505
    area-web-frameworks
  • Ability to use user-selected or system culture in RequestLocalizationOptions #44282
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Adds dialog form method to FormMethod enum #44500
    area-mvc, community-contribution
